name: interestingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to introduce a piece of information that the speaker thinks is strange or interesting: Interestingly (enough), he never actually said that he was innocent.

Add to word list
Add to word list
Interestingly can introduce a piece of information that the speaker finds surprising and interesting: Interestingly enough, he never actually said that he was innocent.
